  • Uses of CommandException in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.commands

    Methods in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.commands that throw CommandException
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    CommandStack.execute(Command command)
    Executes the given command, pushes it onto the undo stack, and clears the redo stack.
    void
    CommandStack.redo()
    Redoes the last undone command and moves it back to the undo stack.
    void
    CommandStack.undo()
    Undoes the last executed command and moves it to the redo stack.
